about.descripcion: Hi! Nice to see you here. I'm Axel, a person who was going to be a developer but ended up reconsidering it, seeing that I had more possibilities as a pentester by breaking everything I touched.

custom_text.descripcionlarga1: I could start by telling something funny, but I inevitably suck at telling jokes. When I was born, I was assigned this little qualification for it.
custom_text.descripcionlarga2: In my personality cauldron, in contrast, the man who was in responsible for creating me must have dropped the whole pot of stubbornness and obstinacy. And to tell the truth, I thank him for that. Because thanks to all that excessive stuff, I am who I am today. A very career-focused, demanding and responsible person. But that doesn't make me particularly weird (I think). I consider myself an open and sociable person (if I go out of the house), very nice but with a difficult face.
custom_text.descripcionlarga3: If there is something I like, it is to follow the advice of great people, and if you allow me, I will make special mention of one person, and I will borrow a phrase that has marked me.
custom_text.cita: Don't let anyone get close to you without feeling a little bit better and happier when they leave.

knowledge_skills.knowledge1: Programming languages: PHP, Typescript, Js, Java, .NET and Python
knowledge_skills.knowledge2: Use of pentest tools like nmap, foxyproxy, dirb, gobuster and chisel
knowledge_skills.knowledge5: Development of static and dynamic Web Apps
knowledge_skills.knowledge6: Development of Web, Infra audits and Red Team
knowledge_skills.knowledge7: Medium level of English speaking and writing
knowledge_skills.knowledge8: Using automated tools like Burpsuite or Nessus
